TemporalDirections.TEXT: 159,JERRY,Lip area.,1.0,S01E01,1.0 160,GEORGE,You know a hug definitely good.,1.0,S01E01,1.0 161,JERRY,Hug is definitely good.,1.0,S01E01,1.0 162,GEORGE,Sure.,1.0,S01E01,1.0 163,JERRY,"Although what if its one of those hugs where the shoulders are touching, the hips are eight feet apart?",1.0,S01E01,1.0 164,GEORGE,"Thats so brutal, I hate that.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 165,JERRY,You know how they do that?,1.0,S01E01,1.0 166,GEORGE,"Thats why, you know, a shake is bad.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 167,JERRY,"Shake is bad, but what if its the two-hander? The hand on the bottom, the hand on the top, the warm look in the eyes?",1.0,S01E01,1.0 168,GEORGE,Hand sandwich.,1.0,S01E01,1.0
